name: Generic Cube Game (kennymakesgames)
description:
How to play:

A and D moves your player sideways. Avoid obstacles and make it to the end!

What is this?

This is my first semi polished game! It's mostly the same as Brackey's Cubethon (How to make a Video Game), but there are some cool changes 😎 I'm calling it Generic Cube Game since this game has been made many times by many people.

What's different?

  • Customizable character colors!
  • A pause menu
  • 5 different levels with varying difficulty
  • Other small changes
